column2: Grown for 9 years in the highlands of Jalisco, Mexico, VIVIR's 100% Agave Tequila is produced from the finest Weber Blue Agave. With a nod to tradition, Clay ovens (Hornos) are used to cook their Agave, using natural volcanic spring water from a well at their distillery. The end result is a natural, fresh and authentic spirit that stays true to its Agave routes.
